title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 470.3 - Definition of tractor
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 470.3 - Definition of tractor

State Regulations

For purposes of this Subchapter, the word tractor means a
self-propelled vehicle used for drawing other vehicles and not primarily
constructed to carry a load independently. For example, a vehicle which is
principally used for drawing other vehicles is a tractor, even if it is
equipped with a rack enabling it to independently carry a
load. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20

470.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
